extraDescription: EI Transformation Agenda: The assigned resource shall provide business analysis and support to the EI PMO as it relates to needs of the assigned EI Transformation projects or activities. Working with a team of departmental staff, Project Sponsor/Lead, Project Manager, and the EI PMO, the Business Analyst will provide business analysis support for EI Transformation Agenda projects and activities. The Business Analyst will facilitate the capture, collection, and communication (internal and external clients) of business requirements / needs in accordance with EI PMO standards and industry best practices.
